title: 魔法の帽子
description: The magic hat that was thrown in the river is found stuck on a small island. Moomin and Snufkin retrieve it, discovering it can transform things - river water becomes raspberry juice. When someone puts a seed in the hat, a giant tree grows in the basement, trapping the family until the Hobgoblin arrives to help.
notes: This episode continues the magic hat storyline from episode 1. Features the antlion character and the Hobgoblin (飛行鬼).
